name: Liftable Tree
description: A tree that can be lifted by the player, potentially dropping loot when destroyed.

fields.name: Loot Type
fields.description: Defines what, if anything, is dropped when the tree is destroyed.

0.name: Force Gems
0.description: The tree drops Force Gems when destroyed.

64.name: No Drops
64.description: The tree does not drop any items when destroyed.
